data.name: Zombie Friday
data.detailed_description:
Outbreak of zombie plague turned some cities to undead-infested hell. One of most lucrative jobs in this bleak future is zombie hunter. And there is one day in year, when all zombies remember theirs most hidden instincts from past human life - Black Friday! Worst of the worst came back to mall. Miners, hoping to snatch new graphic cards. Scalpers, trying to buy all new consoles to sell them with huge profit. Those big sweaty guys who smell and push in front of lines. Karens, searching for manager. Orange man, spewnig vile bile everywhere.

There isn't better day to start as zombie hunter. So pack your mags and go hunt!


    - top-down shooter with minimalist graphics
    - homage to old games from '90 s
    - thrilling gameplay - hunt zombies in darkness, use flashlight and light sticks
    - don't stay at one place long, or you will be overrun
    - grenades, 10 weapons to unlock
    - 11 types of zombies

data.short_description: Fight zombies of scalpers, miners and other vile characters on Black Friday night. Zombie top-down shooter with funny references to most recent events tormenting gamers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 4150
  • Memory: 4086 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or better
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
